languages.text:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.
languages.original_text:
Атакуя цель, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} которой уменьшена союзниками архмилитанта с помощью каких-либо эффектов, архмилитант наносит на 10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Атакуя цель, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} которой уменьшено союзниками архмилитанта с помощью каких-либо эффектов, архмилитант наносит на 2 урона больше.

traits.locale_text:
When the Veteran attacks targets that have their armour reduced by the effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran deals +10% damage.
When the Veteran attacks targets that have their deflection reduced by the effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran deals +2 damage.

When the Veteran attacks targets that have their armour reduced by any effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran deals +10% damage.
When the Veteran attacks targets that have their deflection reduced by any effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran deals +2 damage.

When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.

When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.

languages.text:
当首席战士攻击时，如果目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}由于首席战士盟友造成的任何效果而降低，首席战士的攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高10%。
当首席战士攻击时，如果目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}由于首席战士盟友造成的任何效果而降低，首席战士的攻击额外造成2点伤害。
languages.original_text:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.

traits.locale_text:
当老兵攻击时，如果目标的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}由于老兵盟友造成的任何效果而降低，老兵的攻击造成的伤害提高10%。
当老兵攻击时，如果目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}由于老兵盟友造成的任何效果而降低，老兵的攻击额外造成2点伤害。

languages.text:
Cuando el Archimilitante ataca a un objetivo cuya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} haya sido reducida por los efectos aplicados por sus aliados, el Archimilitante inflige +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
Cuando el Archimilitante ataca a un objetivo cuyo {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} haya sido reducido por los efectos aplicados por sus aliados, el Archimilitante inflige +2 de daño.
languages.original_text:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.

Cuando el Archimilitante ataca a un objetivo cuyo {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} haya sido reducido por los efectos aplicados por sus aliados, el Archimilitante inflige +2 de daño.

languages.text:
味方が付与した効果により{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が減少したターゲットを攻撃した場合、アーク・ミリタントが与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+10%増加する。
味方が付与した効果により{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}が減少したターゲットを攻撃した場合、アーク・ミリタントが与えるダメージが+2増加する。

languages.text:
Wenn der Erzmilitant Ziele angreift, deren {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} von Effekten reduziert wird, deren Ursprung die Verbündeten des Erzmilitanten sind, fügt der Erzmilitant +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
Wenn der Erzmilitant Ziele angreift, deren {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} von Effekten reduziert wird, deren Ursprung die Verbündeten des Erzmilitanten sind, fügt der Erzmilitant +2 % Schaden zu.
languages.original_text:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.

traits.locale_text:
Wenn der Erzmilitant Ziele angreift, deren {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} von Effekten reduziert wird, deren Ursprung die Verbündeten des Erzmilitanten sind, fügt der Erzmilitant +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
Wenn der Erzmilitant Ziele angreift, deren {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} von Effekten reduziert wird, deren Ursprung die Verbündeten des Erzmilitanten sind, fügt der Erzmilitant +2 % Schaden zu.

languages.text:
Lorsque l'archimilitant attaque des cibles dont l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} est réduite suite à l'application d'effets par ses alliés, il inflige +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.
Lorsque l'archimilitant attaque des cibles dont la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} est réduite suite à l'application d'effets par ses alliés, il inflige +2 points de dégâts.
languages.original_text:

When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +2 damage.

traits.locale_text:

Lorsque le Vétéran attaque des cibles dont la {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} est réduite suite à l'application d'effets par ses alliés, il inflige +2 points de dégâts.

languages.text:
Başmilitan, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerleri Başmilitan'ın dost birimlerinin uyguladığı herhangi bir etkiyle azaltılmış hedeflere saldırdığında +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Başmilitan, {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerleri Başmilitan'ın dost birimlerinin uyguladığı herhangi bir etkiyle azaltılmış hedeflere saldırdığında +2 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
